website_summaries.verdict: A dark purple shampoo that's a very potent, super brightener.
pros: Eliminates all signs of brassiness, and brings cool tones to blonde and silver hair
Some users reported leaving it on longer than suggested to get a lavender hue
cons: Very staining, so use gloves and old towels

customer_reviews.title: Not quite what I thought it was, but what it actually IS is pretty awesome
customer_reviews.text: I'm greying and growing out my old blonde color. I *thought* this might take the yellowish tone of the old blonde color out of play. It didn't quite do that (several years... okay, decades ... of L'Oreal Preference might have been too much for it to cut through?). What it DID do, and the reason I'll keep using it, is take the grey that's growing in and remove all the 'dull' from it. What was a mousey dull steel wool is now an amazing silvery / white / stainless steel shine fest. I would never have expected that, but wow, I'm keeping it ; )
customer_reviews.author: HWhite

customer_reviews.title: Wowza!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not one to leave reviews. . . but this product deserves it! Holy cow! I was going to go into the salon to brighten my hair up, but after discovering this product I cancelled my appointment. I'm totally in love! This shampoo is not drying at all and just after two washes I achieved my desired results! I can't recommend it enough! Photo (from right to left): Before using Fanola, one wash, two washes. Love, love, LOVE!! 😍😥😥
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: My hair dresser recommended this product and I had to text her to ...
customer_reviews.text: YOU GUYS!!!! My hair went straight to silvery white from a extremely brassy blonde with only a 5 minute application. My hair dresser recommended this product and I had to text her to tell her thank you because I am so obsessed with the results. Fist picture is a BEFORE to show the brassy blonde. The second is an AFTER just to show the spots I must have missed while washing and the third picture is an AFTER, just look at that silvery white <3
customer_reviews.author: Madison Horsley

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best purple shampoo I have ever used and I have ever seen. Look at my pictures, it even turned my hands purple. I have had my hair platinum blonde for about three years now and I’ve been searching for something that will keep my hair platinum blonde, and I’ll tell you what, this works! I highly recommend it! And can’t beat the price. Just so you know, the purple did come out by the end of the day from my hands
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo A Rivera

customer_reviews.title: BRUNETTE to BLONDE.. NO YELLOW!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I recently went from a level 4-5 box dye (I know, so terrible!! Never doing that again!!) to a blonde balayage level 8-9 after 3 bleaching sessions. This is the only Shampoo that even remotely removes the brassiness from my hair. I've tried Shimmer Lights by Clariol, Total Results So Silver by Matrix, The Perfect Blonde by Pravana... None of them can even compare because of the effectiveness of Fanola No Yellow Shampoo. Don't waste your money on those!! Fanola No Yellow Shampoo will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs_MP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t work and this product is a rip off, you can find the real product on their website! It’s about $35
customer_reviews.author: taylor householder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results!!!
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is “wow” I am in disbelief that a shampoo could offer such amazing results! I have tried many different purple shampoos to combat the brassy tones our hard city waters gives me and this is by far the best one I have used. I applied it and put my hair in a bun and left it on for 5 mins then rinsed and used normal conditioner. The smell is interesting kind of like nag champra incense. I would recommend scrubbing your palms immediately after application and avoiding drips onto your face if at all possible as it does stain. All in all I highly recommend this product 👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Do not use on color treated hair
customer_reviews.text: I have both natural gray roots and dark brown hair. I have been getting silvery gray highlights to blend in my grays and dark gray low-lights over the brown. The shampoo was fine for my roots, but the shampoo removed the glaze on both the highlights & low-lights - my hair is a mess and needs to be redone (not cheap). I have been getting this process done for a while - its not new - and this happened the first time I used the shampoo; I left it on for 1 minute (bottle says 1-5 minutes). Wear gloves as it will stain your hands; don't use when showering.
customer_reviews.author: JRiley

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but leaves stains
customer_reviews.text: My hairstylist recommended this shampoo and said its the most potent purple shampoo out there. She wasn't kidding. I shampooed my hair using this and my usual conditioner. I did leave it on for the suggested 5 minutes. When I blew it out, I was left with some slight lavender streaks in my hair. Fortunately it didn't look that bad! Two days later I washed using my everyday shampoo, the lavender mostly washed out. Despite having some temporary lavender streaks, I would still recommend this shampoo. It did get rid of the brassiness. I would just be careful not to leave the shampoo on that long otherwise you might stain your hair like I did.
customer_reviews.author: TheCatLady92

customer_reviews.title: Too legit to quit
customer_reviews.text: OMG Holy Grail Purple Shampoo. Took my hair from a (still foxy) slightly too golden for my taste blonde to a gorgeous icy, icy blonde in about 7 minutes. You have to follow the right steps: 1. Wash with your normal shampoo to remove all buildup. 2. Squeeze all excess water out of your hair (especially ends). 3. Apply shampoo, lather a bit to make sure product coats all strands. 4. Clip it up and shave your legs, exfoliate or whatever time suck you do in there. 5. Rinse after 7 to 10 mins. 6. Towel dry. 7. Stand back and admire icy blonde gorgeousness that would give Princess Elsa a run for her money. ( Talking snowman not included).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Grey streaks and burnt scalp
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely do not use this product. I followed the directions and it left streaks of grey/blue in my hair. I scheduled a hair appointment to fix it and a chemical in the shampoo reacted with the bleach and burned my scalp. (I last used the product Monday morning and had my hair appointment on Friday). I now have red, raised, oozing areas on my head. My hair turned out fine, but my scalp is a different story. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great for toning, a little drying
customer_reviews.text: great purple toning shampoo! I don't mind the smell of it at all and if you use conditioner, the conditioner smell is what will be left in your hair anyways. Speaking of conditioner - it is a must with this shampoo! Although this does a great job at color toning (which is what it's made for), it is also pretty drying so it's good to use a pretty thick deep conditioner afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Results!
customer_reviews.text: Fanola No Yellow Shampoo is a fantastic product, but it’s more like a toner than a shampoo. I used my regular shampoo for color treated hair, then applied a tiny amount of Fanola (dime sized), and distributed it evenly throughout my hair. Finally, followed with my regular conditioner. This product makes hair shiny and lustrous, while toning down unwanted yellowness. No more brassy blonde locks for me! Be prepared for many compliments!
customer_reviews.author: SCBohemian

customer_reviews.title: SMELLS DISGUSTING
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how this product has so many positive reviews. It makes me question the validity of the reviews. This shampoo smells so awful. Like a Gas Station air freshener. I have used it 3 times and I can’t get over how bad the scent is. It also stains my hands purple!! Just don’t, seriously. It’s ick!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Pigmented and limits brassiness
customer_reviews.text: I’ve seen this shampoo multiple places and have heard so much about it so naturally had to try it! It came exploded, but it’s sealed in plastic so not the end of the world. You honestly don’t really lose much product, but still... Compared to shimmer lights, it’s light years better. It’s thinner but much more pigmented. It doesn’t really have a lather to it, so you kind of have to use quite a bit to actually cover everything. As far as a purple shampoo goes though, it’s definitely effective! Wouldn’t recommend to use it every time you wash your hair because It will build a purple layer so beware of that lol I would definitely buy this again! 👍
customer_reviews.author: jenniwithani

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: I was REALLY hoping my purple shampoo search would come to an end.... it seriously didn’t do anything but slightly make the lightest blonde pieces a light shade of purple. There’s still TONS of yellow and brassy tones. It also made my head hurt which I noticed other purple shampoos do the same thing. Kinda strange. I first put it on dry hair, let it sit a few minutes, washed it out and no change. I then put it on damp hair, let it sit for TEN minutes and still nothing..... :( If anything changes I’ll right another review fingers crossed!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I’m a natural blonde, and this was horrible
customer_reviews.text: I’m a natural medium warm blonde (level 8-9) and I get highlights a couple of times a year. My hair has been looking a little brassy lately after swimming, so I thought I’d try this based on all of the stellar reviews. I left it on for exactly 2 minutes, and it was a disaster. The smell is very strong and it’s very drying, but I was prepared for that. I wasn’t prepared for what it would do to my hair color. It’s now dark and dull. I’m so disappointed that I’ve had to call my hairdresser to make an emergency appointment to see if she can fix it. I would not recommend this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Corieann

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! I have natural dark hair so this is ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I have natural dark hair so this is a maintenance supply to keep my bleached highlights ashy. I don’t think it damages or dries out my hair at all. I first shampoo with cleansing shampoo, then tone with this purple shampoo, and finish with hair mask. Scent is bearable and does not linger in our hair. Did not stain my tub or tiles, but did stain my shower curtain lining. I wear plastic gloves which completely precents your hands/nails from turning purple. I do get them on my neck, shoulder, etc while applying but those spots wash off completely.
customer_reviews.author: vevette000

customer_reviews.title: USE IT ON DRY HAIR & LET SIT FOR AT LEAST AN HOIR
customer_reviews.text: Magic in a bottle! My hair was extremely brassy near my scalp and golden blonde from my ears down and omg it was horrible. USE THIS ON DRY HAIR AND LEAVE IN FOR AT LEAST AN HOUR. When I first tried this, it was in the shower like normal. I left it on for about 10 minutes and it worked, just minimally. You really have to be patient though and let it stay on your hair while it tones it. This is much stronger than your normal purple shampoo, it really will tone your hair. Using it while my hair was dry made it much more successful. Go buy it, you will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Laura M

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty on bleach highlights
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought the lightest parts of my hair had a slightly gray tint, but now I love it! I left it on wet hair for 10 minutes after first using a clarifying shampoo. I would do 5 minutes next time and skip the clarifying shampoo. My hair was very gold and this blended with my natural roots better. The more gold and darker parts of my hair got a little bit darker, more ashy and muted. One complaint, it is drying, but that may have been because I left it on so long. Overall I’m very happy with it! The color is very pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Ferrer

customer_reviews.title: Fanola is great
customer_reviews.text: I love this shampoo. It tones down brassy hair and gives it a beautiful white color. I leave it on for 3 minutes and use it once a week, sometimes twice. It smells terrific and I love the way it makes my hair look! This is the best shampoo to make your white hair shimmer!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnice E. Forshey

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: I've used a lot of purple shampoo and this is by far the best one. I bleached my light brown hair to go blonde. I used ash blonde dye to tone but it still didn't really do the trick. This shampoo, after one wash, turned my hair almost platinum. I would definitely recommend. It's the only purple shampoo I've ever used that gave me immediate results and I will definitely purchase again. It looks super dark, but it won't leave your hair purple like some other shampoos. I followed the directions and washed once then repeated and left it in for 5 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Made my hair feel smooth again
customer_reviews.text: I have black Asian hair, meaning that it is naturally very straight, sleek and healthy for the most part. I recently got highlights and surprise, the bleach killed my hair :( I was hoping this wouldn’t happen but I knew what I was getting into when I dyed my hair at home. Since I bleached my hair at home, it is also uneven and not as light as I’d hope, so I decided to give this shampoo a try. I left it in for 5 minutes and then used my regular conditioner and my hair feels so smooth! Only complaint is the smell but it isn’t unbearable, just pretty unpleasant. I highly recommend to anyone who has bleached their hair.
customer_reviews.author: Meliza

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: This is a little drying, but I don’t buy this to moisturize my hair. As someone who has had Platinum hair for years, I have a regimen. I shampoo with my Klorane shampoo twice in a row until my roots and length are clean. Then I apply this and lather it really well at the roots and then down the length to the tips. I leave it on only about 30 seconds after that, then rinse with lukewarm water to help close the follicle. After a towel dry, I apply a protein mask and finish with a silk spray. I only use this toning shampoo once a week. Anything more would be overkill. It keeps my hair brilliantly white.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best invention of all time
customer_reviews.text: I know we have landed men on the moon, have satellites up in space and have extended the average persons lifespan by decades, but I think the real accomplishment that actually matters to women, is this right here. This is the best invention since the wheel. I would give this 10 stars if I could. I used it two days apart, 4 minutes day 1, assessed, and 2 minutes day 2, and am astounded. Gone is valley girl bleached blonde hair, in its place is bombshell blonde. Massive bottle will probably last until my pixie is waist length again. Best purchase of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Fay

customer_reviews.title: I’m never going to the salon to get my hair toned again!
customer_reviews.text: I’m never going in to the salon to get my hair toned again!!!!! This has worked wonders on keeping my hair from turning brassy. I have well water, so when I first went blonde my hair would turn brassy immediately. This saved me from having ugly brassy hair in-between hair lightening appointment. It is extremely pigmented, so it will turn your hands and nails purple for a bit. It does make your hair really dry, so I usually dilute it with my moisturizing shampoo, followed with a deep conditioning conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Highly Pigmented
customer_reviews.text: I will admit I was a little scared to try this. Especially after pouring it into my hand. It was a glorious shade of Violet purple. The reason I was scared, because I automatically assumed that It would dye my hair purple. When in fact, after rinsing it out, I was pleasantly surprised. Forgot to take a before and after, but it toned down the yellow from my blond very nicely. I will probably only use about once a week, but looking forward to achieve the color I've been wanting gradually.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Towner

customer_reviews.title: Great for blondes who goes brassy
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I suggest mixing it with your normal shampoo so it's not as strong because it will definitely give your hair a purple grayish tint otherwise. I only leave it in for about maybe 4 minutes. The first side by side photo was from the first time I used it and had only left it in for 30 seconds. The 2nd photo is in natural light of course but what it looks like after I left it on for 4 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Wow
customer_reviews.text: I am shocked. Shocked. I have bought numerous purple shampoos, even the super expensive ones and this is SERIOUSLY the ONLY one thats worked. Wow. It doesn't smell bad, I don't even think I smelled anything. You need to use moisturizer after using this, but that's a given. This actually works, ladies! I went from a yellow, ugly color, mostly because of the water in my well, but I have to say this is amazing. I would buy this if you want a product that actually works lol So many out there that don't do what they advertise. I'm just shocked... Also, I only left it on for approx. 3 minutes. WOW!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Raven Wall

customer_reviews.title: Returned my highlights!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really does work, I use it about 3x per week and make sure to leave it in for at least 5 minutes while I'm in the shower. I have dark brown hair with several lighter highlights that were turning brassy and orange. After 3 treatments with this stuff my hair is back to salon professional color. I was worried the first time I used it that it would dye my skin purple because the stuff runs everywhere but no worries, the only thing it sticks to is your hair and does not leave any stains on my skin or shower. Also smells great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Knauer

customer_reviews.title: Did the job
customer_reviews.text: I needed to tone my hair so I purchased this. My coworker later gave me a bottle of another brand that she never ended up using (because she gave up on blonde) and the differences are crazy. This one doesn't do much to soften your hair at all, in fact it makes it feel really...odd. It also smells dreadful. I even asked my boyfriend and he said it smelled very harsh - the one my friend gave me though smells AMAZING and does a little more on the softening side. I will still finish this bottle off but definitely know now that there are better options for close to the same price.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shubert

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best color correcting shampoo! I have colored medium blonde hair with light blonde highlights and was very brassy, and I hated it. After trying many different violet shampoos, I finally came across this one and I am so glad I did! First , I used the No Yellow shampoo and that brightened my light blonde highlights, but didn’t do anything for the brassy medium blonde. So, then I used the No Orange and WOW! Finally, my hair a nice shade of medium blonde with light blonde highlights and very little brass! I am so happy! I love this stuff and will continue to use it!
customer_reviews.author: MyKidsMom

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo back in October after my hairdresser recommended this particular product (she sent me the this amazon link to save money) for my brassy hair. I used this product twice without any significant results. I contacted my hairdresser to ask when I should expect to see results. She asked me to describe what I was doing and in my description I told her that it was difficult to apply given that it is the consistency of water. She immediately stopped me and told me that I had been duped. The REAL shampoo is supposed to be very thick like molasses. So buyer beware! Not sure what I bought, but it is not the real product :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Shields

customer_reviews.title: First non dye/color/peroxide that took away the yellow!
customer_reviews.text: Easy peasy, only used once on my silver/white hair that was plagued with hard water yellow deposits....UGLY! After my first use, all of the yellow was gone. The areas that had the deposit are darker white but I think that will go away with the next use.....waiting until next week. I rubbed it in the areas that were a problem let it sit for exactly 3 1/2 minutes and rinsed it out. I used a clarifying leave in spray conditioner, styled and was thrilled with the result. No damage whatsoever. This product is for real! I've used so many shampoos/conditioners that were supposed to correct and after religiously using nothing but more yellow.......
customer_reviews.author: nestaway

customer_reviews.title: Best Purple Shampoo Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST purple shampoo I’ve ever used. I’ve been able to go at least twice as long between hair coloring because it toned my color so well. I was advised by my stylist to use a good conditioner because it might cause dryness but when paired with conditioner it has been great. I get so many compliments about my hair color when it has been 1-2 months since I had it colored. I recommend it to everyone who compliments my hair. The pictures from the reviews are accurate. Works so well!
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: works!! tricky with balayage
customer_reviews.text: definitely a learning curve— it didnt do much to my hair around the four minute mark so i found myself using the shampoo twice more in a session—- super drying so with deep conditioning in between! if you have a balayage its going to be a bit tricker as some pieces will need more time to process. after my first session i definitely do want it a bit cooler but the bottle comes with a very generous amount! anyway, definitely a learning curve but the product works super well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very saturated product
customer_reviews.text: I think this is going to work very well. I tested it on some hair extensions first but I forgot about it and left it on for maybe 15-20 minutes and it was pretty much straight out of the bottle with a little bit of water on the hair extensions. So it was very saturated. Needless to say the hair extensions turned light purple. I just washed my hair today and use this as a toner and just left it on maybe for 5 minutes and I noticed my hair toning down but not purple Lexi hair extensions. I'm sure that with a few washings it will tone down even more. I'm excited to see what happens...
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Works very well for transitioning to grey
customer_reviews.text: I've stopped coloring my hair and am allowing my grey to grow out. My family has a strong trend for beautiful bright-white hair and not grey, but as I'm not sure what I'll get yet and we have hard water here, I've been using this to keep my grey/white from yellowing. I'm pleased with the results and it doesn't really affect my still-brown strands. The only thing to be wary of is that it is a color-deposit product. If you're like me and have easily-stained skin, it will give you purple fingers. Trust me. :)
customer_reviews.author: AMac

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to dying hair!
customer_reviews.text: I am a natural dirty blonde and i've spent hundreds at the salon to try to lighten my hair and keep it that way. I started using this shampoo every other day and it significantly made my hair icy! My coworkers constantly ask me if i got my hair dyed again but it is just this shampoo! It does feel a bit damaging but nothing compared to bleach or dyes for your hair. Highly recommend this if you want blonder hair without the salon price! Buying this again when it runs out
customer_reviews.author: Megan Webb

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING STUFF
customer_reviews.text: I love this. It is amazing. I bleached my hair and no matter how many times I toned it with blue, violet, or green based toners I could NOT remove the last bits of yellow and orange. My hair is far too damaged to take anymore bleach so I tried this out of desperation. There is zero yellow in my hair now. It looks AMAZING! Perfect ashy light blonde. It does get on your hands and appears to stain but if you scrub them in the shower with some soap it comes right off. And the smell is.. not great but it’s worth it. I can’t say enough about how well this works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purple shampoo I’ve ever used!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been putting blonde in my hair since I was a teenager and have always used purple shampoos to tone the brassy color. NOTHING has ever worked better than this shampoo. My before and after picture is from one use. Absolutely amazing. It took the yellow tint out of my hair completely. I wet my hair and worked the shampoo in and let it sit for about 5 min before rinsing and used my regular conditioner. Beautiful!! Wish I would have found this product sooner. Ps. This shampoo did stain my hands a little bit but came right off with soap and warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Works GREAT!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is an excellent product to use about once a week, to maintain the “just got my hair toned at the salon” color. It smells better than several other purple shampoos I’ve used, and it works better. Beware though, if you have white nail polish on, it will stain them! So either use gloves or make it really quick. I’ll apply the shampoo and immediately rinse my hands, wait a few minutes and then rinse out the shampoo from my hair. I highly recommend this purple shampoo over any other ones I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: PURPLE NAILS, SKIN, AND TILE GROUT TOO!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you like purple you will love this product. It will turn your fingers, nails, tile grout, and towels purple.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: really good at keeping brass at bay
customer_reviews.text: this shampoo worked wonders for toning down brass in between touch ups!! i had heavily highlighted hair and i always wanted it to be super ashy and fanola helped me achieve that. it’s really strong and not sulfate free so i’d only use it every 2 weeks and i’d just put it on my wet hair and leave it in for 5 minutes but even minimal use was enough to tone my hair. if you’re crazy about getting rid of brassiness and wanna be ashy like i was i’d definitely recommend this. it eventually got to the point where most strands of hair were white.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Perez

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, Low Cost. Worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine's stylist suggested this purple shampoo over the ones her salon sold. I figured for the price I'd give it a shot and it's better than the purple shampoos I've been purchasing for way more money. It takes out the hard water yellow/orange color my city water has and leaves the lighter blondes in my hair with an "icy" shine and brightens the other blonde. Just yesterday I got asked if I had my hair done again, it hasn't been done since July (it's the middle of October). The smell isn't anything special but it works wonders on my blonde. Highly suggest.
customer_reviews.author: abmn

customer_reviews.title: I won’t use another purple shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This picture is a before and an after 2 shampoos. After trying many different purple shampoos, I have finally found one that I will continue to buy. The lighter hairs might become tinted purple if left on too long (will fade with next wash). However, I don’t like how drying my hair feels after rinsing is, but if used with a reputable deep conditioner, my hair feels back to normal to me. I can use my normal hair shampoo the other days and I don’t notice that much of a difference in tone that I need to use this purple shampoo more than once a week! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Viozzi

customer_reviews.title: Do not use If you have naturally white or platinum blonde hair.
customer_reviews.text: I washed my platinum hair with this shampoo. I entire head of hair turned lilac. I rinsed it repeatedly. It is still a dark lavender color. I tried calling my stylist. They are closed due to the COVID -19. It is completely embarrassing. I look as if I have the hair of an older woman in the 50"s. I am hopefull that with several washes, it will eventually come out. I have used Blue Malva by Aveda and never had any color change in my hair. My beautiful platinum hair is gone and has been replaced by a dark lavender gray color. Grrrrrr
customer_reviews.author: Samson

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great purple shampoo. I have a mix of some grey and blonde and a natural red tint to my natural brown hair so I get brassy easily and quickly. This is DARK purple and looks like it will stain your hands/nails lol- I wash it off ASAP. I put it on dry before I get in the shower at times too- no dilution that way. But it works just as well on wet hair. It only needs about 2-3 mins to get me back out off the copper zone AND it doesnt leave my hair brittle. I follow with a normal shamp/cond. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Meggotron

customer_reviews.title: Turns scalp and hands purple
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently got blond highlights. After a few weeks, the blond got very brassy. I heard great things about purple shampoos, and thought we’d give it a try. It works very well. After 1 application, the brassy color was gone ash’s she was back to blond. The only problem is that her scalp was stained purple! Like, bright purple. We thought that maybe she didn’t rinse well enough, but she did. Her hands were even tinted purple. So while it works well, there are certainly unwanted side effects
customer_reviews.author: MomOf2

customer_reviews.title: Amazing at cutting brassy tones
customer_reviews.text: I don’t buy this for its scent, moisturizing quality, or softness. I buy this because it’s amazing purple shampoo and does exactly what a purple shampoo should. If cuts the yellow and tones the brass. It’s extremely pigmented, which I love. But it’s also pretty drying and I only use this every other time or less- maybe one to two times a month. You definitely need a good conditioner when using this product. And I usually shampoo before using. But it’s one of the best purple shampoos I’ve ever tried and you really can’t beat the $12 price tag- even when purchasing from the beauty supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Morgy Morg

customer_reviews.title: Very potent purple shampoo.  I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I heard good things about this shampoo and thought I'd try it...I have used many other purple shampoos and this one is definitely the strongest I would suggest diluting it with a little bit of your every day shampoo if your not looking for that purple tint. It arrived fast and wasn't leaking or anything which I was happy about after seeing some of the other reviews stating that it leaked all over. The only thing I didn't like about it is the SMELL. Smells kind of like musty flowers or maybe its just not appealing to meat? but if u use a good conditioner its not that bad.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Denker

customer_reviews.title: This toner is not a joke!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is not a joke in the least. It’s super strong stuff. Left it on my hair too long (10 min instead of 2-3) and some of it did snap off actually- so the reviews you read ab that happening to people are real. However, I could have also avoided some of this if I’d erred on the side of caution instead of being gung ho w a new product. Follow up w lots of conditioner etc to restore balance. Regardless, what hair I have left is pretty white!!! 😂 I have a bleached 4c Afro by the way.
customer_reviews.author: Cocoro

customer_reviews.title: Works well, and works quickly
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This really works...quickly. I have a combination of champagne bleached-and gray hair. I noticed that between appointments my hair would start to yellow. I saw a you-tuber mention purple shampoo so I looked at the reviews on this one and decided to give it a try. This removed all of the yellow/gold tones in two washes! A little goes a long way. Definitely follow the advice of the other reviewers and use gloves. This works. If you have bleached or gray hair-give this a try. I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: T. Candace Lillis

customer_reviews.title: Its great..
customer_reviews.text: I used this today and it definitely works!! People really dont read bc some said this wasnt a shampoo of that its drying. Well yes that is a purple shampoo & research should be done on what a purple shampoo is. I dont agree in giving a bad review and saying it doesnt work when u clearly dont know anything what your putting on your hair. Its amazing if you hair is super bleached or close to grey it will turn your hair purple bc its so strong. Its awesome!! Dont trust the other people who dont know anything
customer_reviews.author: Genesis Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Good but not life changing!
customer_reviews.text: It does work at removing yellow tone but it did not remove it completely. It will turn bleached hair purple in a short amount of time. I left it on for 2 minutes and had purple streaks. But after 2 washes the purple is almost gone! It is also not hydrating at all so make sure to condition really good afterwards, especially if you have dry or damaged hair from bleach! It does seem to work better than other purple shampoos I have used in the past, so I will be using it in place of the others from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Jcdrama

customer_reviews.title: Not sure where I/the product went wrong
customer_reviews.text: I was so hopeful seeing the videos and reviews. Even after being paranoid my hair was too orange instead of yellow, everything I saw said the blue and purple are so similar that it should have still done SOMETHING. Not sure if I got a bad bottle or if something is wrong with my hair... but I did 2 applications on freshly bleached hair and it did NOTHING. EDIT: I'm going to try this again on even lighter hair once I get there, just to give it a fair shot and see if maybe my hair was starting out too orange. Take warning though, if your hair is any darker than mine, the shampoo does nothing.
customer_reviews.author: AMBER

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Purple Shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Love the product! The shampoo has toned my blonde hair since day one, being able to tell the difference for sure! I usually do half regular shampoo & half purple shampoo - as you know, you don’t want to leave it in for too long (3-6 minutes should do it). I have noticed the product does make your hair a tad bit stiff if you wash with only the purple shampoo. Nothing too crazy, goes away if you use conditioner after. Overall works super great, will not go back to others!
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Has the product been altered?
customer_reviews.text: So I really researched this before I bought it and I'm really sad it hasn't seemed to work at all and I've used it a few washes now. First off it is was more shampoo and frothy when you put it into damp hair then it appears in the pictures. I wonder why theirs appears perfectly purple when I apply it its much frothier lots of whitish bubbles and the dark fades into a lighter purple. Ive let it set for the recommended time plus a few minutes and my hair dosnt seem to loose any brassiness.. But hey its smells alright!
customer_reviews.author: jn

customer_reviews.title: You need this purple shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: You NEED this purple shampoo in your life! Especially if you’re a blonde whose hair likes to turn brassy like mine. I’ve bought numerous purple shampoos; at least more than half a dozen.. and none have EVER compared to this little bottle’s magic power. Be warned- don’t leave it in too long or your hair will turn a purple-y silver, but it will wash out after a few washes. I use this once a week to maintain my desired color. I also recommend washing your hands as soon as you apply and again after you rinse so they aren’t stained purple. This is worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: Tori Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: No need to use any other purple shampoo
customer_reviews.text: Honestly no need to buy any other purple shampoo. The smell is overpowering and really not my favorite but even with that....I will only purchase this product. I does not suds up a ton and does not make my hair soft/shiny but it really does get the job done. I recommend washing with your usual shampoo and adding this as an extra step between your usual shampoo and your conditioner. You will definitely need to condition after using this.
customer_reviews.author: Lorian McConnell

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep the blonde in
customer_reviews.text: The shampoo deserves the rave review it gets; I've tried a few different purple shampoos, and this is my favorite. I'm not a natural blonde (I was red, originally brunette) and this stuff really helps maintain the light blonde. I use it 2x a week, sometimes just once a week depending on timing (I leave it on the full 5 minutes) or if I use a purple conditioner. On the one hand, the smell isn't my favorite, but it's certainly not a bad scent, and it's not very hydrating, but on the other hand, I didn't buy it to moisturize, I bought it to enhance the blonde effect. The quality is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: For blonde hair only! Your hair must be already processed for this to work it’s magic. By far the most potent purple shampoo I’ve used. So only overuse it. It’s not something you can use every time you wash your your because it will turn your blonde silver (depending on how light your hair is already) also I would recommend wearing gloves because it will stain your fingernails. Esp of you have on acrylic with light color polish. I leave it on for 5-10 mins and then wash. I also would recommend deep conditioning after because this shampoo is also very dry. Other then that this is one of the best purple shampoo I’ve used.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Ahhmazing
customer_reviews.text: The smell isn’t the best, but it’s not the worst. This also isn’t a super moisturizing shampoo. So if you’re looking for that- move along! But if you’re looking for a top notch toning shampoo? THIS IS IT. I have naturally dark dark brown hair and decided to be blonde (quarantine got to me). This has kept my hair from being brassy and has been a godsend. Watch how long it’s in for though because it can turn your hair purple! (Was warned, didn’t listen, found out the hard way)
customer_reviews.author: Kuter

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this shampoo because all the awesome reviews it had
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shampoo because all the awesome reviews it had. I have a very light blonde hair color (almost white) and I was looking for a purple shampoo to tone the brass on the roots every time I dye my hair. I read a few reviews that left your hair purple but compared to the most reviews of how awesome it was, was not a big deal! It DID leave my hair purple. I only had it on for 5 min. not even the complete recommended time. VERY PURPLE! not very happy with it. The packaging was fine, very well package and sealed but the results not much.
customer_reviews.author: Patrys

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My daughters bleach blonde hair is starting to turn brassy and I couldn’t find any purple shampoo in the store so I decided to order it. I chose this one because it was the cheapest. When it came in the box was covered in the purple shampoo and so was the bottle. There was BARELY any shampoo in the bottle. I am very disappointed. I wouldn’t recommend ordering this stuff because the same thing happened last time I ordered a purple shampoo that was $30. I got the shampoo all over my hands because the bottle was a mess and it ended up staining an expensive pillow. Please don’t buy this crap.
customer_reviews.author: Lily .C

customer_reviews.title: Must have for blondes
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo actually lathers and smells somewhat decent. It is very potent and does what it’s supposed to. I used it for 10 minutes on wet hair after shampooing and the results were amazing! After reading others reviews about staining I used gloves to apply and was careful not to splash but places that did get shampoo on came off easily. Definitely recommend for blonde maintence. Every time I use it I get compliments and asked if I got my hair done. See before and after pics
customer_reviews.author: Beth21TC

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Purple "Shampoo"
customer_reviews.text: This is basically a toner. The consistency is that of a toner and it works just like a toner on light bleached hair. I followed the directions and applied it to WET hair, I let it sit for 3ish minutes, rinsed, shampooed, and deep conditioned. ALL of the yellow in my hair was gone. I was actually going to make an appointment to have my hair toned but changed my mind after using this. This product is great if your hair is light enough of a blonde and you follow the directions. It was a tad drying but actually less drying than shimmering lights shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli

customer_reviews.title: Toner For In The Shower
customer_reviews.text: This stuff isn't your everyday purple shampoo. It will keep your blonde light! Be careful not to leave it on for very long as it will turn your blonde silver or grey if you're not trying to achieve that. It's basically a toner for the shower. And this stuff will stain your hands and shower if you have anything white in there. This product is instant and should only be used every so often. Every minute the product is in your hair the lighter it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Julien

customer_reviews.title: Most effective purple shampoo on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've been dying my hair blonde for half my lifetime. This is the first purple shampoo I've ever used that has made a significant difference. I've tried Clairol, Redken, and numerous other products - none of which seemed to make much of a difference. My hair stylist recommended it to me after seeing the difference it made in the salon, I went straight home and ordered it. It WORKS! It tones all of the brassy, warm undertones and leaves you with a nice shade of blonde. You don't need to leave it on for long. It will turn your hands and nails purple (and anything else it touches), so wash everything right away.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my blonde hair, amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST PURPLE SHAMPOO EVER!!! I kind of like the smell although i know some people find it strong but i notice that with a lot of purple shampoos. This is the best one for toning and getting rid of the brassiness especially in between salon appointments. It can be a little drying so i only use it about once a week but this is life changing. I can't wait to buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Turned my white hair too purple although it was subtle. Toned it down too much, took the gleam away, which I had wanted to enhance. It did the opposite. But that's just my hair. Maybe others will do better. I gave it two stars though, because I did NOT find it messy to use, as others indicated. I washed my hair in the shower, then applied using gloves. It did not color my scalp or skin in any way, and did not splash all over at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. B

customer_reviews.title: Great product but arrived leaking
customer_reviews.text: Product works great to help take yellow tones from my blonde hair. It did arrive leaking but was wrapped in cellophane so the mess was contained and not much product was lost. The purple is very pigmented and does come out almost black in the shower. It will stain your hands so if you have very dry skin I would wear gloves to apply! The scent isn’t bad at all compared to other purple shampoos. I do use a heavy deep conditioner when I use this product as purple shampoos can be very drying.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha C.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for every blonde!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!! This is seriously a miracle product. I rinsed my hair with this and nothing changed so I thought it was a flop product. However the next day I got my hair wet, lathered this in, and let it sit for 45 minutes. When I looked in the mirror after that 45 minutes my light yellow hair had literally become Snow White. A little bit more expensive than clairol shimmer lights, but soooooo much better.
customer_reviews.author: jfenn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! My hair needed to be toned and after using this it was toned plus a bright ash blonde! I’ve never been this blonde before. I left on for 5 mins and it did great on the ends. Still a little warm by my root. I left on for 10 min the next time and had some purple tinge in my hair- which was fine. Leaving it for 10 mins didn’t brighten near my root as much so I’ll stick to he 5 mins. I find it’s very runny though and it drips all over when using. I will buy this again and recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: libbi

customer_reviews.title: Left my hair super bright!
customer_reviews.text: The first use my hair went from a brassy blonde to almost silver! I dont even remember my hair being this blonde when I last had it colored 6 months ago. First time using it I put it on in the shower, but it was super hard to spread through my hair evenly and I ended up with streaks of almost white hair and streaks of the still brassy color. Second time around I used coconut oil to deep condition my hair, then went through with the purple shampoo. It spread evenly and didnt dry out my hair like it had the first time. Now I have even, bright blonde hair. LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic purple shampoo! It’s dark and inky, and I feel like it could be easy to overuse. Since the pandemic, it’s hard to keep the brassy tones out, but this shampoo is great! My favorite way to use it is to mix about a quarter sized dollop with a conditioning treatment so that my hair can soak up the purple and keep my bleached hair on the ashy side. Great value for the price. I’m very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Young

customer_reviews.title: Will NOT buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Never trust what you see on the internet. There was no change to my hair, the smell was putrid at first but I’m able to handle it now (it smells like the inside of a crystal/natural herbs and scent shop so it’s not too bad.), and this stuff is so extremely drying... I feel like it did more damage on my hair than the bleach. Very disappointed. I was really hoping this would work. Also it stains your hands verrryyyy easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Best Purple Shampoo!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before I found this product, I was using Matrix So Silver and would have to leave it on for quite awhile to see any noticeable difference. Fanola is a game changer, but be careful, it will dye your hands/skin if left on too long. It turns my brassy yellow locks back to a beautiful vibrant blond instantly! I do not buy this shampoo for the scent or for "moisturizing" effect as purple shampoos aren't known for smelling the best or being the best for your hair. I only use this shampoo maybe once every week or two weeks (depending on how often I wash my hair).
customer_reviews.author: Kim H

customer_reviews.title: Purple Food Coloring
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst purple shampoo ever. I should have returned this when I still had the chance. It has a terrible heavily fragrant scent that smells like an older woman’s house and will dye everything purple! I can put it in my hair, rinse it right out and I will have purple hair. Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: Ali S

customer_reviews.title: Works but negatives outweigh positives
customer_reviews.text: Seems VERY watery compared to the salon. Like I can barely keep it in my palm without it running through my fingers like water. The smell is definitely NOT great. Leaves your hands and nails tinted purple longer than usual. Not purchasing this product on here anymore. One positive is I think it works decently. But just feel like quality isn’t where it usually is. Definitely buying from my hairdresser or Ulta.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully!
customer_reviews.text: My brunette/gray hair is baliaged blond. After a few times in the sun, it gets yellow FAST. I had never used purple shampoo, but am so glad I did! It cooled the yellow tones nicely, and I think if I left it on longer (I only left it on for about 3 minutes being a newbie), it would have been even more effective! I plan to incorporate this into my summer washing routine, for sure! One word of warning - it is pretty powerfully pigmented! My fingernails are still slightly purple in places even after showering and hand washing, but not enough that anyone else would notice...
customer_reviews.author: R.

customer_reviews.title: Saved my hair!
customer_reviews.text: This shampoo is amazing! But for me only after I figured out how to use it. You MUST wet your hair, I did it dry and literally nothing happened, and you must do it twice in a row. I leave it on each time for 5 minutes. Your hair is going to feel like straw so I immediately put on a deep conditioning mask for 15-20mins, then viola beautiful platinum hair! I do it weekly to keep all brassiness at bay.
customer_reviews.author: Ksweat

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS PURPLE SHAMPOO!!! You can tell a difference after one wash for sure!!! It is a super dark purple (the darker the better!) so it will stain your hands, but I LOVE THIS SHAMPOO!!! It doesn't have that grandma-ish smell that I find some of the other purple shampoos have. I don't feel like this dries out my hair, but it doesn't necessarily moisturize it as much as a hydrating shampoo would which is why I don't use it everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Doherty

customer_reviews.title: Better than most toners!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was scared at first but after using it a couple of times I’m very impressed! The first time I used this shampoo it only picked up some pieces leaving me With all types of colors!! My hair wasn’t even to begin with so I gave it another try and I’m so glad I did! I did have to process some pieces for different lengths of time to get my hair to match but this is by far the best purple shampoo in ever tried! Better than most toners! Amazing if you want ashy grey/purple tones!
customer_reviews.author: Justene

customer_reviews.title: Strong- be careful
customer_reviews.text: Works well but be careful- it is SO drying. It dried out my hair so much during the beginning of my blonde journey so I wasn’t routinely replenishing the moisture as much as I should have already with chemically treated hair, but this made it spiral out of control. It got so incredibly brittle and dry and my hair dresser was baffled with the condition of my hair at the next appointment. Now, it really does do a great job with brassiness IF you are remembering to care for your hair a little extra. It’s super pigmented- it even dies your hands temporarily in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Callaghan

customer_reviews.title: Does not do what it says it will do!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two bottles of this one for my daughter and one for me and we tried it together and we both hated it really bad. It did not make either of our hair any lighter, it makes your hair tangle really bad, hair gets matted really bad, it smells horrible, your hair feels so coarse and rough. Our two bottles are both just about almost full. We would love to have a full refund or report it to the main company. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Omg a product that works!
customer_reviews.text: Giving it a five stars with and OMG it works! This shampoo has a syrup like texture, be ready to be stunned by the vibrant purple. Like the reviews suggested gloves, do it as it will stain your fingers. Instructions suggest 1-5 minutes to leave in, but it feels and acts like a hair dye more then shampoo for me. I had to be careful when washing. It was my first purchase, it will kill the yellow in your hair for sure. Definately will buy again. Do yourself a favor and buy this
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: New secret weapon
customer_reviews.text: This product made a big difference on my hair from the 1st use. Was kind of weirded out about the deep purple color, but it toned down some brassiness on the back of my head, and made the silver in front sparkle! Will probably use it every other time I shampoo. The product doesn’t produce a ton of lather, which is great because it rinses out easily in the shower. If you have a little drones or frizziness like I do, you will want to use a conditioning product. Otherwise, it does leave a nice finish on the hair for normal to oily hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tones Blond and Brassy Highlights
customer_reviews.text: Pros: This shampoo does a great job of toning blond and brassy highlights. While I cannot get to a salon, this shampoo is helping to keep my highlighted hair looking good. The effects last through one or two washes with regular shampoo. Cons: The scent is a bit sweet and grapey. Also, the dark purple color of shampoo may stain some light surfaces, if you do not clean it off after use.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FOR BLEACHED BLONDES
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS THE BEST! I was using shiny silver ultra from Sally's beauty supply and it wasn't eliminating the yellow tones in my bleached blonde balayage. ONE wash with this shampoo and my hair looks like I just got it done. So happy with the product as long as my hair is blonde I'll buy this stuff! The first photo is before the second is after. I left the shampoo in for about 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This produce will save you hundred of dollars
customer_reviews.text: I have light brown hair with an icy-blonde balayage. I got my hair done in early August; it's now mid-November and my hair has not turned brassy at all (maybe a tiny bit yellower, but I also wash my hair a ton because I work out a lot). I could probably go another 2-3 months without getting a touchup, and even then I probably won't need to get my hair completely redone. I use this product only once week and it's kept my hair in great shape. The only downsides are that it has the potential to get all over your shower (it's really dark purple) and it'll temporarily stain your cuticles purple.
customer_reviews.author: Nina R.

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTE GAME CHANGER!!!! Yassssssssss!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMGGGGGGGGGGGGGG IM shook to my core, LITERALLY!!!!! You guys I have NEVER found a purple shampoo that can cut brass like this. It has changed my life! I was soooo close to giving up on platinum blonde forever after months and months of trying to tone, bleach, spending tons of money at the salon. STILL the brassy would sleep through after the first/second wash 🙄 I wash and condition my hair then I put this in and let it sit for 5 to 10 minutes. I mean it depends on your how how little or long you want to leave it in for but truly it works. HIGHLY recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Fayton

customer_reviews.title: Took away the orange/copper color
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. Bought this shampoo to cover up the copper hair color my hairdresser used on my roots,hated the copper color and didn’t want to go back to her to have it fixed. The shampoo worked great to cover the orange/copper color. I originally left it for 5 minutes only but after rinsing I realized that I have to reapply so this time I left it for another 8 minutes.The result is great,it took away the orange color and kind of turned it into a brown . I love it.
customer_reviews.author: N H

customer_reviews.title: Works Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: My hair has never been easy to bleach or tone. Even after going to the hair salon I would still be left with some yellow brassy hair in places. I’ve tried so many different shampoos, timers, etc but this one WORKS. I used it once on my wet hair and it helped, but then I decided to try putting it on my hair while it was dry, making sure to put it on the most brassy parts first. I left it on for about 15 minutes and was left with amazing results. If you need something to help get rid of that yellow brassy hair, this is it!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Works Great - Toned My Hair Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Do not leave it on for more than 10 minutes or it was dye your hair purple. I did and my ends turned purple for about a week - but it actually looked cool and I got a lot of compliments from people thinking I did it on purpose so I didn't mind. Lol Also buy a really good conditioner for after. This is very drying. I usually use Shimmer Lights but I thought I'd give another product a try. This worked way better on my hair. Will be my go to purple shampoo from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Airwrecka86

customer_reviews.title: Amazing, but please read review.
customer_reviews.text: It works amazing BUT- use with caution. This stains your hands and skin, so work quickly! I only use this once MAYBE twice a month. It’s really brightens up my hair, it is drying so again use with caution. I feel like if it was left on the hair too long it could easily stain. Also rinse any purple residue off your bath and shower immediately. This is by far my favorite purple shampoo, no doubt about it.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Nichelle Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Don’t let it sit for longer than the directions
customer_reviews.text: This product was a Tik Tok buy, you have to be careful because it is very stripping. I had yellow hair and after I let it sit for awhile it was very grey, and not the pretty grey that you’re aiming for, just more of a washed out color. After awhile some of the brass returns as always so it looks fine now. This stuff also permanently stains your carpet if your dog or child gets into it. I have a huge purple splotch to deal with that I need to find a rug for!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Fazekas

customer_reviews.title: Amazing toner
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review: I absolutely recommend this toner again but I have to add this point that this is not a shampoo for every shower use! This is like toner so do not use it every time you shower! My scalp has become a little dry, maybe it is related or not! My first review: I love this product, it is a great toner for turning brassy and yellow hair to a cool and ashy shade, It effects more when you apply it longer, it only works on level 8 and lighter. You should have this if you dye blond!
customer_reviews.author: Aida_ty

customer_reviews.title: Not your average purple shampoo!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is not your average purple shampoo. It’s way stronger and made my lightest blonde highlights silver. It brought my hair to the coolest tone, however kept roots kinda dark. It’ll stain hands so wash then right away. It also stained my scalp purple. I left it on for 6 minutes. I tried it again and mixed it with a regular shampoo and same result. I think I now probably need corrective coloring.....but I’m just gonna let it fade out. It works just be aware of your hair. My hair is very thin and porous so it wasn’t the best for me. Definitely is drying too so use a decent conditioner after for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Tones great!  Not for cleaning hair.
customer_reviews.text: This is not good for shampooing your hair but it tones awesome! I wash and rinse my hair with regular shampoo first to cleanse. Then I lather this in and leave for a few minutes to tone. It does great at removing the yellow! The smell is not good and it feels like it’s not doing anything softening to my hair. But I follow up with conditioner and everything’s great. Totally recommend as long as you’re not trying to use it as actual shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

product_meta.title: Fanola No Yellow Shampoo, 11.8 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
Size:11.83 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)

With time comes change, and hair is usually the first place we notice it. But don't stress any more if the grey streaks are setting in. Fanola has you covered with their line of No Yellow Shampoo. It's made with a violet pigment that turns down the grey or lightened hairs to be less noticeable. There's nothing wrong with going grey, but this No Yellow Shampoo helps you keep your color consistent and vibrant. It's an easy way to help time pass with a little more grace. No Yellow is used for bleached, blonde, streaked, and grey hair.

Features:
Ideal, for grey, super lightened, or decolored hair
Violet pigment tones down unwanted yellow hues on grey, light blonde, or streaked hair

SHAMPOO
No Yellow Shampoo neutralizes yellow reflections driving from pigment residue after bleaching, lightening and the oxidizing action of the elements. No Yellow treatment is the only professional treatment formulated with a special violet pigment with intensive action that neutralizes yellow reflections giving the hair a cool, bright, even reflection.

How/When: Apply on damp or dry hair for 1-3 minutes and rinse. Use gloves to prevent staining of the hands. Apply once a week or when yellow becomes visible.

SKU: SO-26-01
